title: ViviMusic Gets Live Updates!
subtitle: Major Update for Android 16+
description: ViviMusic now supports live updates for Android 16 and above. A milestone achievement powered by community collaboration!
content: We're excited to announce that ViviMusic now supports live updates! This feature brings real-time content delivery to your music experience without requiring app updates.

blocks.subtitle: Section 1: Live Update Support
blocks.content: ViviMusic now supports live updates for Android 16 and above! This breakthrough allows us to push new features, content, and improvements directly to your app in real-time.

blocks.subtitle: Section 2: A Community Milestone
blocks.content: The introduction of this dynamic news system is a major milestone for ViviMusic. This achievement was made possible thanks to the source code provided by LiveMedia. Special thanks to RossSihovsk for the LiveMedia project available at https://github.com/RossSihovsk/LiveMedia

blocks.subtitle: Section 3: What This Means for You
blocks.content: With live updates, you'll always have access to the latest features and improvements without waiting for app store updates. Stay tuned for exciting new content and enhancements coming your way!

blocks.subtitle: How to Activate
blocks.content: You can easily enable this feature by navigating to Player Settings. Look for the 'Live Media' option and simply toggle it on to start receiving real-time updates.

blocks.subtitle: LiveMedia Menu
blocks.content: Once enabled, you can access the dedicated LiveMedia menu to manage your settings. This new menu provides a centralized place for all your live update preferences.
